description_html:
Steelcase Series 1™ delivers what’s important – ergonomics, quality and choice. It retains everything that’s valued in a chair, while making it attainable for everyone.

Series 1™ features integrated LiveBack™ technology, adaptive bolstering and 4D-adjustable arms, which provides ergonomic performance and quality uncommon to this class of seating. It is designed with a lightweight, slim profile, making it appropriate for all offices. With shell options, an extensive range of finishes and the choice of a headrest, it makes a powerful statement in any space.
